Before turning 6, I lived in 33 십정동 부평.

This is a story, as told my uncle, when I was 3 or 4.

[십정동 이야기, a video](https://home.mycloud.com/action/share/4a4e0a90-840b-4109-9511-60289d413c16)
[an Audio](https://home.mycloud.com/action/share/367af081-2c7f-4744-9bb2-c2541c3037ea)

I had heard about the accident, growing up.

But this is the first time, I heard what happened to me and my uncle one winter afternoon.

## Overview (via ChatGPT)

> a personal story about a car accident that happened when a family was living near a road in a lower-lying house. The narrative describes how a military vehicle from the U.S. army base lost control on a snowy day, crashed into a store attached to the house, and came dangerously close to the narrator and a sibling who were warming themselves by a small stove. The narrator recounts how they survived what should have been a deadly incident, attributing it to a miracle or divine intervention.

## Creating Multimedia Files

1. Record audio using a cellphone, save the `.m4a` file
2. Process the file using `Audacity` or a software of choice, save the file as a `.WAV` file
3. Import the audio file from step #2 and any photos into the `iMovie`.  Try to line up photos to match the event being described.
4. Import the file into MS Word and use the `transcribe` option
5. Take the output of transcription of the audio file and translate it into other languages, using `ChatGPT`.
